FuncDef:
The srv6-te-policy locator command associates an SRv6 TE Policy with an SRv6 locator and specifies a binding SID for the SRv6 TE Policy.
The undo srv6-te-policy locator command restores the default configuration.
By default, SRv6 TE policy does not associated with a locator.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies SRv6 locator.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After configuring the Binding SID for the SRv6 TE Policy, you can use the Binding SID for path stitching. The Binding SID needs to be configured within the Locator network segment.
You can use this command to associate an SRv6 TE Policy with an SRv6 locator and specify a binding SID for the SRv6 TE Policy.
